It appears to increase the Holorifle's damage.

这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上使用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上使用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well howdy, pardner! Good to see you again. Boss is waiting for ya upstairs, so get a move on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好啊，搭档！很高兴又见面了。老板在楼上等你呢，上去吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [00112073] (ID) Quest : ([001132EF]VDialogueLucky38Entrance) Lucky 38 Entrance Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't look like you've brought back the Platinum Chip!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好啊，搭档！看起来你没拿回白金芯片啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [00112073] (ID) Quest : ([001132EF]VDialogueLucky38Entrance) Lucky 38 Entrance Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you mosey on back to wherever it is you left Benny cooling off? Come back when you got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为何不再去本尼的尸体旁仔细搜一遍呢？等你找到了再回来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [00112073] (ID) Quest : ([001132EF]VDialogueLucky38Entrance) Lucky 38 Entrance Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [0015725E] (ID) Quest : ([001132EF]VDialogueLucky38Entrance) Lucky 38 Entrance Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {player trying to go to penthouse with companions}Sorry, pardner, if you're heading for the penthouse, you gotta go alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: {player trying to go to penthouse with companions}对不起，伙计，你要去顶楼的话，只能自己去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0015725E] (ID) Quest : ([001132EF]VDialogueLucky38Entrance) Lucky 38 Entrance Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {attacking player who has betrayed House}You low-down snake! I wish {Ida}I'd have left you in the ground to rot!
ESP.TRADUIT: {attacking player who has betrayed House}你这条卑鄙的毒蛇！我当初就该让你烂在土里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0015725E] (ID) Quest : ([001132EF]VDialogueLucky38Entrance) Lucky 38 Entrance Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [0015725E] (ID) Quest : ([001132EF]VDialogueLucky38Entrance) Lucky 38 Entrance Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know everything you need to know. Be on your way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要知道的已经都告诉你了。行动吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Whale}You've been good to us, baby - now let us be good to you. We'd like you to enjoy this private suite as long as you're in town.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Whale}你对我们太好了，宝贝——让我们来报答你吧：在你离开这个镇子之前，随时都可以享用这个私人套间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Tops Floor Manager [00145F8A] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sheriff of Primm}Thanks for getting me that pardon. Me and the boys will take good care of Primm, don't you worry.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Sheriff of Primm}谢谢你让他们赦免了我。我会和弟兄们守好普瑞姆的，别担心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Sergeant Lee. Lieutenant Hayes radioed ahead to say you were on the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是李中士。海耶斯中尉已经电告了你的到来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got surprise on our side, and that's about it. Once we blow a gap in the fence, we've got to pour on the fire and keep them disorganized.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们准备了一个惊喜，就在这边。一旦在围墙上打出缺口，我们就会迅速发起突袭，打他们个措手不及。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our goal's to take out their leader, some assbag named Eddie. With the ringleader gone, the rest will fold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的目标是干掉他们的头目，一个叫埃迪的混蛋。没了领头的，剩下的全都不堪一击。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all the briefing you're going to get. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任务简报到此为止。我们上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They never told us how expensive it was to get onto the Strip!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们从来没说过去一趟长街要花这么多钱！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never should have left California.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就不该离开加利福尼亚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That son of a bitch Keith cheated me! I know he did!
ESP.TRADUIT: 基斯那个狗娘养的骗了我！我就知道是他！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You lose all your money too?
This is a restricted area. Step away immediately.
This is taking too long. We can't let Salt-Upon-Wounds escape. I'm going to find a way around. God willing, we will finish this together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们浪费太多时间了，绝不能让伤口撒盐逃跑。我去寻找另一条路。上帝保佑我们尽快结束这一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, well, well. Look what walked in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀，哎呀，哎呀。看看谁来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody around here's hiring if you're looking for work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是来找工作的，我们这里不雇人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Interesting way of handling things. Very {soob}sub {roh-sah}rosa.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你处理问题的方式很有趣。简直瞒天过海。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if the Scorpions deserve to be wiped out for something they didn't do, but that's one less problem Westside has to deal with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道毒蝎帮该不该因为自己没做过的事而落得个被全灭的下场，但西区确实少了一个麻烦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anderson turned in for the wrong reason and Westside gets to keep siphoning water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安德森蒙冤进了大牢，西区可以继续抽水用了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's hard to find justice in all of this, but I suppose this is as close as it gets. Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然这事从头到尾都谈不上公正，但我想结果也算可以接受。谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Stern Warning, Deadpan}Return to the surface, citizen.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Stern Warning, Deadpan}立刻返回地面，市民。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Boone shot No-bark}No-Bark was harmless. There's no way he had something to do with Boone's wife.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Boone shot No-bark}疯嘴不会伤人。他不可能和布恩妻子的事情有什么关联。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [00116A4F] (ID) NPC : Oliver Swanick [00134985] (file) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [00116A4F] (ID) NPC : Oliver Swanick [00134985] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {exulting}I won the fucking lottery, hear me! So fuck y'all! Whoohoo!
ESP.TRADUIT: {exulting}这狗日的抽奖，我赢了！听见没！操你们丫的！哦呼！ !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Oliver Swanick [00134985] (file) Quest : ([060019E8]GoodiesQUEST) 060019E8 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bears in pain. Head voices not surprised.
ESP.TRADUIT: 熊很痛苦。脑袋里的声音并不感到惊讶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You appear to require assistance. I'll go find someone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你似乎需要帮助。我会去找人的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Howdy. My name is Jed Masterson, and I'm a caravan boss for the Happy Trails Caravan Company.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。我的名字叫杰德·马斯特森，我是“欢乐小径”商队公司的老板。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Spoken as Starlet, charming, beckoning, beginning a commercial}Has your life taken a turn? Do troubles beset you? Has fortune left you behind?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Spoken as Starlet, charming, beckoning, beginning a commercial}您的生活遭遇挫折了吗？您被烦恼所困扰了吗？命运抛弃了你吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {puzzled aroo}[Rex defaults to melee attacks since he has no ranged weapons.]
ESP.TRADUIT: {puzzled aroo}[雷克斯由于没有远距离武器所以默认为使用近战攻击。]

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to change your combat style.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你改变你的战斗风格。

ESP.ORIGINAL: To the Bone Orchard you go!
Been years since I did this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 已经好几年没活动筋骨了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lay into me! I deserve it!
Uh oh! I did something bad!
{concerned}Fighting's not my strong suit, but I'll see what I can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: {concerned}打仗虽然不是我的强项，但我还是尽力而为。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, boss. You lead the charge, I'll follow as fast as my arthritic, rotting knees can carry me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，老大。你带头，我就算废了这条老腿，也心甘情愿，万死不辞。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to send an elderly, half-decrepit ghoul into combat? Your tactical brilliance is unmatched, boss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您想派我这个半死不活的老尸鬼去打架？您可真是神机妙算哪，老大。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry, pumpkin, {gramma}grandma's here to help!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别怕，小南瓜，{gramma}奶奶就是来帮你的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leo! Try not to chop our friends this time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 利奥！这次千万别再砍我们的朋友了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to get some licks in, too!
Yeah, let's show them how Kings rumble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，让他们瞧瞧猫王帮是怎么干架的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to buy a dinosaur souvenir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想买一个纪念品恐龙玩具。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there radioactive material in your rocket souvenirs? It would explain the glow and the illnesses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的纪念品火箭玩具里面有放射性材料吗？这样就能解释发光的事情和那些疾病了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I, ah, well I don't really know. Would that sour you on buying one if it did?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 我，啊，我确实不知道。如果是这样，你是不是就不会买了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just know what I've heard. There's supposed to be some ghouls that went in a while back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也只是略知一二。好像不久前有一伙尸鬼进到里面去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every so often there'll be a commotion from that direction - explosions and such.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之后时不时就会从那个方向传来骚动——爆炸之类的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about supplies? And guns? Do you sell those?
ESP.TRADUIT: 补给品呢？还有枪？你有卖吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guns? I, uh, well... yeah, I guess I might have a few.
ESP.TRADUIT: 枪？我，嗯，好吧……我想大概可能是有的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Darn it. No one ever buys the t-rexes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼。就是没人买霸王龙纪念版品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: 'Cause they know I ain't just barking here. What I say's got bite, 'cause it's the truth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为人们都知道我没有多嘴。我说的都是事实，事实会咬人的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Them quack doctors can say what they want about all the radscorpion stings that done pierced my skull. I know what I seen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些江湖郎中可能会说什么我的脑袋被辐射蝎蛰过之类的胡话。可我却看得是明明白白。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do they call you No-Bark?
If you're going to be weird, I'm just going to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你净说些离奇事，我就走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Weird's just normal when normal decides to start taking notice of things. You just think about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离奇也不过是正常人想获得他人关注所采取的正常手段罢了。你想想是不是这个道理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now what'd you come here for?
Let me know if you meet anyone suspicious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你见到可疑的人就告诉我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said you'd stab me with that dirty knife.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说过要用那把脏兮兮的破刀捅我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, okay. Just speak up a little. But not so much that They hear you. They got people everywhere, always listening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧。我不过是吓唬人罢了。别太大声，会叫他们听见的。他们到处都布了耳目，就为了偷听情报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who tried to make you talk?
Confound it, No-Bark, you done it again. You let on that you know things. Now they'll never let you be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真要命，疯嘴，你又搞砸了。你让人看出你心怀鬼胎了。现在他们不放你走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, stranger, you got me. What do you want to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，陌生人，我认输。你想要知道什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll just see about that. You come any closer and I'm liable to stick you with my stickin' knife. Ol' Sticky's feeling mighty ornery this day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那可得用事实说话。你要是再敢走近一步，我就用这把刀捅死你。今天老刀子的脾气可不太好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you get a look at the attacker?
Beg your pardon mister, but them two-headed beeves ain't worth getting shot over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请原谅，先生，为了这几只双头畜牲去玩命可太不值得了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not to mention what would happen if half of what No-Bark says is true.
ESP.TRADUIT: 更何况，要是疯嘴说的那些话有一半是真的话，那就太可怕了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Best we can hope is that whoever's doing this'll move on, or get tired of it. I just hope it happens while we still got animals left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们顶多也只能希望袭击者能尽早离开，或者哪天杀腻了。希望那时候咱们还能有几头牲口剩下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoever it is, I don't think they're from around town. Seems like they've taken to shooting from the west side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管凶手是谁，我想应该不是这镇上的人。他们好像是从西边开的枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beg your pardon ma'am, but them two-headed beeves ain't worth getting shot over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请原谅，女士，为了这几只双头畜牲去玩命可太不值得了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not to mention what would happen if half of what No-Bark says is true.
ESP.TRADUIT: 更何况，要是疯嘴说的那些话有一半是真的，那就太可怕了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Best we can hope is that whoever's doing this'll move on, or get tired of it. I just hope it happens while we still got animals left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们顶多也只能希望袭击者能尽早离开，或者哪天杀腻了。希望那时候咱们还能有几头牲口剩下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoever it is, I don't think they're from around town. Seems like they've taken to shooting from the west side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管凶手是谁，我想应该不是这镇上的人。他们好像是从西边开的枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those thieves had some gall, stealing from a museum dedicated to romanticizing a couple of criminals!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些小偷真是厚颜无耻，他们居然敢从雌雄大盗的博物馆里偷东西！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll make sure the gun ends up back on display. I thank you, Primm thanks you, and I do believe Vance'd thank you, if he could.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会把枪重新放回陈列箱里的。谢谢，我代表普瑞姆感谢您，我相信万斯若是泉下有知，也一定会感谢您的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found the gun. Here it is.
What do you think of the people who live here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得住这儿的人都怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, we keep to ourselves, for the most part. Try not to pry. I think Jeannie May gets bothered that we aren't more sociable, but it's just our way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我们很少与人来往，也不爱打探别人的私事。估计珍妮·梅也因为我们不爱社交而大伤脑筋，可我们就习惯这样过日子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't that we don't appreciate what she's done, managing this town like she has, but I worry she feels that way anyhow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 倒不是说我们不感激她，毕竟她花了那么大功夫打理这个镇子，可我还是担心她误解我们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not that there ain't others who pry around here. That No-Bark was skulking around our yard last week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，爱打探的人也是有的。上个礼拜疯嘴就想溜进我们的农场来着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Laughs> I thought he was our cow-killer. Was about to lash him with our bullwhip till I saw who it was. He's harmless, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: <大笑> 我以为他就是那个杀牛的凶手。正打算用鞭子抽他，然后才看清楚是谁。他这人没什么危险。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Part of me wishes I could see things like he sees 'em, all full of mystery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实我还挺羡慕他那种处世的态度，看什么都充满了神秘感。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, saints alive. That is a load off. Nothing to be done, though. Those ghouls just didn't know when they weren't wanted. Couldn't take a hint.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗，您可真是活神仙啊，让人松了口气。看来我们也不必再操心了。那些尸鬼根本不知道自己不受欢迎。真是些不开窍的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And aren't you just the most unexpected gift our little town ever had? Here, take this. And go buy yourself something nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您该不会就是老天爷赐给我们这座小镇的礼物吧？来吧，拿着这些。给自己买点好吃的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed the ghouls at REPCONN.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀掉了瑞普康的尸鬼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave? I don't believe that was what was discussed. They could be back tomorrow knocking on my door wanting hand-outs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赶走？我记得当初咱们可不是这么约定的，弄不好他们明天就会再跑上门来找我要饭呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, I know what I promised, but my mind is just not at ease about this. I'm afraid I can't pay you for what you done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，虽然我确实做了承诺，但这一结果并不能让我放心。恐怕我不能付你钱了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got the ghouls to leave the area. They won't be bothering you anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把尸鬼赶出了这片区域，他们不会再来找你麻烦了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you make the training VR yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个模拟训练是你自己做的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not far from it. When we reclaimed this bunker, I found a number of VR tapes. Most were corrupted, but a few programs still ran.
ESP.TRADUIT: 差不多吧。我们进驻地堡的时候，我找到了一些模拟磁卡。大部分都损坏了，不过一些程序还能运行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Taggart [000E2F83] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Using those as my foundation, I was able to code the training VR, as well as other applications.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以此为基础，我编写了一整套模拟训练程序，还有一些别的应用程序。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Taggart [000E2F83] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any idea what the NCR's up to in Primm?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道NCR在普瑞姆做什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Military operations are classified information. The brass is familiar with the situation at the NCRCF.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军事行动属于内部机密。我想上面的人应该会更清楚NCR监狱的情况。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does the NCR have any plans to attack the prison north of here?
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR有进攻北面监狱的计划吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] <Primm Slim buzzes and whirs while he reformats.>
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] <普瑞姆·斯利姆在重新格式化时发出嗡嗡和呼呼的声音。>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well look at that. I happened across this data file locked away in an isolated sub-system.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀，你瞧。我在一个孤立的子系统里找到了这份数据文件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scan your data registry. You've been hacked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 立即扫描你的数据注册表。你被人入侵了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I convinced Pauline that you shouldn't go through with this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经说服了宝琳，她也觉得应该收手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Oh, thank god! I love that woman, but I swear this time she was gonna get us killed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？哦，感谢上帝！我爱那女人，但她这一次真的差点害死我们！

ESP.ORIGINAL: The gun's in the safe. The combination's 05-23-34. Take it far away from here, before she changes her mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 枪在保险箱里。密码是05-23-34。在她改变主意之前，带着枪赶紧走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pauline says you should give me the gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 宝琳说你应该把枪给我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Charm Pauline into Rethinking their plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吸引波淋以让他重新考虑他们的计划。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Really? You think so? We've only got the one gun, and there's two of us... and we've never done anything like this before...
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 真的吗？你也这么想？我们两个人，却只有一把枪……我们以前从没做过这种事……

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've never been on the Strip, either, so we don't know how many guards the casinos have. And I kept having these nightmares...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们也从未进过长街，所以根本不知道那里的赌场有多少守卫。而且最近我还一直做噩梦……

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are we thinking? We're gonna get ourselves killed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都在想什么呢？这根本就是送死嘛！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, tell Sammy to give you the gun, all right? Just take it! I don't want it around, tempting us to do something stupid!
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，你去让萨米把枪交给你吧，行吗？拿走吧！我不想再看见它了，老是诱惑我们干蠢事！

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the greatest plan I've ever heard in my entire life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我这辈子听过的最伟大的计划。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Some Powder Gangers did you wrong, is that it? Well, get in line.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 难不成炸药帮的人欺负到你头上了？那你可得排队了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, you do look capable enough, and manpower hasn't been easy to come by...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，你看着倒是有两把刷子，何况现在人手也不好找……

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. If you want to put yourself in harm's way, I'll help you do it. I'll mark the staging area on your map. Talk to Sergeant Lee.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行吧。如果你非要给自己找罪受，我也没意见。我会在地图上给你标明集合地。去跟李中士报到吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to help your troops take the prison back. Believe me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想帮助你的部队夺回监狱。相信我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I don't know how they'll do it without you - if they are going to do it - but I guess they'll have to manage. Now get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 就算没有你，他们也会攻下监狱，只要他们有这个决心。虽然我不知道手段如何，但我相信那伙人的实力。所以现在，你给我出去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I could help the troops attack the prison, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我能帮你们的部队攻下监狱，你知道吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some Powder Gangers did you wrong, is that it? Get in line.
ESP.TRADUIT: 难不成炸药帮的人欺负到你头上了？那你可得排队了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, you do look capable enough, and manpower hasn't been easy to come by...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，你看着倒是有两把刷子，何况现在人手也不好找……

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Fine by me if you want to put yourself in harm's way. I'll mark the staging area on your map. Talk to Sergeant Lee.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行吧。如果你非要给自己找罪受，我也没意见。我会在地图上给你标明集合地。去跟李中士报到吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Classified or not, I want to help make the attack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不管什么军事机密，我只想帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do all of the brothers use this equipment?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有的兄弟们都用这套装备？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone in the base has to spend a minimum of five hours a week running tactical simulations, but outside that, interest is scarce.
ESP.TRADUIT: 基地里的每个人每周至少要花五个小时进行战术模拟，不过除此之外，也没多少人会对这个感兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Taggart [000E2F83] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It wasn't always this way. When we first moved into the bunker, everyone was so excited that the VR systems were intact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以前可不是这样的。我们刚进驻地堡时，模拟训练系统运转良好，每个人都跃跃欲试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Taggart [000E2F83] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Over time, though, my fellows have become listless and less entertained by the wonders of technology around us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，一段时间后，伙伴们就对这里的各种科技失去了兴致，变得无精打采了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Taggart [000E2F83] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why Apprentice Watkins is such a joy to work with. Her unbridled enthusiasm for virtual combat is unparalleled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我才会如此高兴能与学徒沃特金斯一块儿共事。她对模拟战斗似乎有着无限的热情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Taggart [000E2F83] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, the outsider. I suppose it's too much to ask that jarhead Ramos to keep outsiders away from my research.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，外来人。我记得我已经叫锅盖头拉莫斯让外来人远离我的研究了啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Taggart [000E2F83] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am Head Scribe Taggart, and I am much too busy to deal with the likes of you right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是首席学士塔格特，我现在手头有不少事务，没空搭理你这类人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Taggart [000E2F83] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 这里怎么变成"凶险之地"了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must've heard her radio broadcasts? Though why a human would follow her invitation here is beyond me... unless you didn't listen very closely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你肯定听过她的广播节目吧？我真不明白为什么一个人类会听从她的指引来到这里……估计你是没有仔细听她说什么吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The voice on the radio belongs to Tabitha, the "supreme commander" of Black Mountain - or, as she calls it, the "State of Utobitha."
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个广播是塔比瑟开的，她是黑山——或者按她的叫法，"乌托比萨共和国"的"最高指挥官。"

ESP.ORIGINAL: She took control of this place almost two years ago. The Super Mutants here do whatever she says - and she says humans are to be killed on sight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她大约在两年前控制了这里。这里的超级变种人都听她的——她还下令见到人类就格杀勿论。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still plenty of other problems keeping the 15 shut down, though. Thanks for playing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想要重开15号州际公路，还需要解决其他很多问题。不过还是感谢你的帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I made sure those prisoners won't bother Primm anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我肯定那些囚犯不会再入侵普瑞姆了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That'll help. Still plenty of problems out that way, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 的确有所帮助。但那条路还是有很多问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I restored rule of law to Primm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我恢复了普瑞姆的秩序。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You took out a Deathclaw nest? Either you're lying, or you're tougher than you look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你清理掉了一个死亡爪巢穴？如果你没撒谎的话，那你可是比看上去厉害多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still plenty of troubles out that way, though. Thanks for playing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但那条路还是有很多问题。感谢你的帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed the Deathclaw Alpha Male and Mother at Quarry Junction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在采石场杀死了死亡爪首领和母兽。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's impressive - if you're telling the truth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你说的都是真的，那真是叫人敬佩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, it'll take some time for routes to readjust. I expect I'll be working from here for the foreseeable future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管如此，重新调整路线依旧要花些时间。估计我还是得在这里呆上一阵子了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've cleared all the trouble west of here. Caravans can start using I-15 again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经清除了西边所有的麻烦。商队可以再次使用15号州际公路了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's usually a gun merchant hanging around topside. I'm sure she'll take care of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上面有个武器商人。她肯定会接待你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So where can I buy some weapons?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么我在哪可以买到武器？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Am I selling? Yeah. Am I selling to you? No. Sorry to hurt your feelings, but you're small time. Move along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是有在卖东西。但卖给你？没门。很抱歉伤害了你的感情，可你毕竟是个无名小卒，走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to see what you have for sale.
That's nice. I suspect we'll stick around here, though. Business has been good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那挺好。不过我觉得在这儿待着也行。现在生意还不错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Primm's safe now. I took care of those prisoners.
ESP.TRADUIT: 普瑞姆现在安全了。我处理掉了那些囚犯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Michelle. My Dad and me run this store. His name's Samuel. I take the day shift and he takes nights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫米歇尔。我老爸和我开了这家店，他叫塞缪尔。我上白班，他上晚班。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We came here about a month ago, when Primm went to hell on account of the prison break north of there. Found a bin to call home and set up shop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大约一个月前，普瑞姆北面的监狱发生暴乱，我们待不下去了，就来了这里。我们找了一个棚屋当房子，然后开了这家店。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess that makes you a big hero - in Primm. Like I said, me and Michelle didn't sit around waiting to be saved. Business is better here, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我该称你为普瑞姆的大英雄了。不过我之前说了，我和米歇尔不想靠别人救济。何况这里的生意比那儿更好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I took care of those prisoners myself. Primm is clear now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我亲自处理掉了那些囚犯。普瑞姆现在安全了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Samuel Kerr at your service. Me and my daughter Michelle run this fine establishment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 塞缪尔·科尔，乐意为您服务。小店是由我和我的女儿米歇尔经营的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We came here from Primm about a month past. Doesn't look like much, but it's one hell of a location.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们大约一个月前从普瑞姆搬到这里。虽然看着挺破，但绝对是个好地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did Tabitha end up in control?
ESP.TRADUIT: 塔比瑟是怎么得到控制权的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: For years, Black Mountain was a peaceful community. Its leader, Marcus, broadcast an invitation to Mutants throughout the wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很多年以前，黑山还是一片祥和之地。当时的首领马可世通过无线电向散落在废土各地的变种人发出邀请。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's how I found Black Mountain. So did others, most of them second generation Mutants. Marcus welcomed everyone - that was his mistake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就是这样来到黑山的。其他人也是——他们大部分是第二代变种人。马可世欢迎每个人的到来，可他错就错在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The community ended up being mostly second gen - not very bright, but easy to influence. Fine, until the Nightkin came along, led by Tabitha...
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终这里的第二代变种人占了多数——他们不够聪明，很容易受外界的影响。后来，塔比瑟带着夜行族来到了这里……

ESP.ORIGINAL: In a week she had most of the second-gens thinking she was some kind of prophet - and that she should be broadcasting her "truth," not Marcus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只用了一周的时间，她就让大部分第二代变种人对她顶礼膜拜。他们认为她是先知，她传播的才是"真理"，而马可世只是个骗子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marcus saw what was coming and decided to leave before things got out of hand. He smashed the radio and left to found Jacobstown.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是马可世决定在事情失控之前离开黑山。他毁掉了无线电，之后又建立了雅各布斯镇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are some Super Mutants smarter than others?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么有的超级变种人会比其他的聪明？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not all Super Mutants were created equal. Or at the same time, or for the same purpose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并非所有的超级变种人都是按照同一标准制造的。要么是批次上的区别，要么就是制造目的上的区别。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The first generation tends to be smarter, stronger, and... more civilized, I suppose you could say, than the ones made later, save the Nightkin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与之后制造的相比，第一代超级变种人更聪明，更强壮，也更……文明——大概你会这么说吧，当然夜行族除外。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem friendly, for a mutant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以一个变种人来说，你很友好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep saying things like that, and I won't be so friendly. Not every Super Mutant is a brain-damaged brute.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你再这么说，我就不友好了。又不是所有的超级变种人脑子都有问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Many of us are just as intelligent as basic humans - and the rest don't really have any choice in the matter, do they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们中大部分的智力水平都和普通人类一样——至于剩下的那部分，他们也不想的，是吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] You're listening to Radio Free Utobitha, bringing truth to Utobithians 24 hours a day! Welcome!
ESP.TRADUIT: [郎达] 您现在收听的是乌托比萨自由频道，我们将全天24小时向每个乌托比萨人传播真理！欢迎收听！

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Rhonda} Welcome back, Utobitha. I have with me Best Friend Tabitha, who has something important she'd like to share.
ESP.TRADUIT: {朗达}欢迎回来，乌托比萨。我正和我最好的朋友塔比瑟一起，她有重要的事情要向我们宣布。
[朗达]欢迎回来，乌托比萨。是时候了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Are you tired of getting chased because you're bigger than humans, and scaring them?
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟]你是否已经厌倦了被四处驱赶的生活，仅仅因为你比人类高大，会吓着他们？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] You're listening to UNC - the Utobithian News Channel - with breaking news!
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达]你们正在聆听的是乌托比萨新闻频道——马上发布震撼消息！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is this water so special?
'Cause it's clean. The crops taste funny if you don't use clean water, but the NCR won't give us any and it's too expensive to buy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为它干净。如果不用纯净水灌溉，种出来的庄稼会有奇怪的味道。但NCR根本不给我们提供纯净水，我们也买不起。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dead? But that's... terrible. You're sure? You saw her body? With the way she looks, maybe she just seemed dead, and she really wasn't...
ESP.TRADUIT: 死了？这简直……太可怕了。你确定吗？你看到尸体了？以她的长相来说，她可能只是看起来死了，但其实没有……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angela Williams [000F2746] (file) Comment (NAM2) : realizing that her friend is really dead EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... you've seen enough death to know the difference. I didn't mean to sound ungrateful. I know you tried.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不……你见过很多死人，肯定能看出区别。我不是不感谢你。我知道你尽力了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angela Williams [000F2746] (file) Comment (NAM2) : realizing that her friend is really dead EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keely was brilliant... she'd seen so much. What a horrible waste...
ESP.TRADUIT: 基利非常出色……她见过那么多世面。真是太可惜了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angela Williams [000F2746] (file) Comment (NAM2) : very sad, crushed. Play this line is player didn't recover Keely's notes. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keely's dead. But I found her research notes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 基利死了。但是我找到了她的研究笔记。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dead? But that's... terrible. You're sure? You saw her body? With the way she looks, maybe she just seemed dead, and she really wasn't...
ESP.TRADUIT: 死了？这简直……太可怕了。你确定吗？你看到尸体了？以她的长相来说，她可能只是看起来死了，但其实没有……

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... you've seen enough death to know the difference. I didn't mean to sound ungrateful. I know you tried.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不……你见过很多死人，肯定能看出区别。我不是不感谢你。我知道你尽力了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The notes count for something. I'll keep them safe. Keely's work in the vault won't be lost, and it won't be forgotten.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些笔记相当珍贵。我会好好保管的。基利在避难所中的工作不会被遗忘的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was sent to fetch some research data. No one said anything about a rescue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是来找研究数据的。没人跟我提过还要救人什么的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like you got sent on the same fool's errand I did, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你跟我是被同一个白痴糊弄进来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I give what aid and comfort I can. I have medical knowledge thanks to my time with the Followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会尽我所能去救死扶伤。能掌握这些医疗知识，得感谢过去我和天启追随者在一起的那段日子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to your friend Nephi?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的朋友尼法出什么事了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never was able to reach him. He has allowed drugs and hatred to consume him. He runs with the Fiends north of here, now. They call him Driver Nephi.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直没能联系上他。他任由毒品和仇恨腐蚀自己。现在，他又加入了北边的恶魔帮。人们管他叫球杆尼法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good news, Private. I'm here to relieve you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好消息，列兵。我是来解放你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have proof that Sergeant Contreras is involved in criminal activity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有证据证明孔特雷拉斯中士卷入了犯罪事件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Angry grizzled Drill Instructor yell}Move it! Move it! Move it! Get those legs up you sorry bastards!
ESP.TRADUIT: {灰白头发的训练教官生气的吼叫着}动起来！动起来！动起来！腿给我抬高点儿，你们这些白痴孬种！

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you going to do?
Some of the others, like Sunny, will probably stand up for Ringo if he asks for help, which he hasn't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得如果林戈向我们求助，那其他一些人，比如桑妮，可能会帮助他，但他到现在也没有向我们开口。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personally, I hope he sneaks out of town one night and takes the Powder Gangers with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就我个人而言，我倒是希望他能找一天晚上偷偷溜出镇子，把炸药帮的人都引走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why not just kill Cobb and be done with it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不干脆直接杀了科布？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like our little town got itself dragged into the middle of something we don't want anything to do with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我们的这个小镇已经被卷进了一场人人都避之不及的风波里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: About a week ago, this trader, Ringo, comes into town. Survivor of an attack, he says. Bad men after him, needs a place to hide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大概一周前，有个叫林戈的商人来到镇上。他说被人袭击了，有坏人在追他，需要找个地方躲一躲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We figured he was just in shock, so we gave him a place to lie low. We didn't actually expect anyone to come after him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们觉得他可能是吓坏了，所以就给他安排了个地方藏身。没想到还真有人追着他来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never mind. I want to talk about something else.
Who was that man you were arguing with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟你吵架的那个人是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a convict. Just without the chains. Said his name was Cobb. "Powder Gangers" is what they call themselves. Plenty more like him out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个犯人，没戴镣铐而已。他说他叫科布。他们自称"炸药帮"，像他那样的人还有不少。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Orris shouldn't be a problem any longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欧里斯不会再是个麻烦了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, so it went down like that, huh? I guess it can't be helped now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，所以你们最后谈崩了吗？那看来也没什么好说的了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not subtle, but you get the job done. That's good enough for me. Maybe you can help me with something more important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然你不太懂得变通，但你还是完成了任务，这对我来说已经够了。也许你能帮我做些更重要的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Orris is a fraud. He fakes attacks on his clients and then plays hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欧里斯是个骗子。他制造有人袭击的假象，然后自己再扮成英雄。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So that's how it happens... Okay, then. I'll have some guys pull him off the street when no one's looking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原来是这样……好吧。我会叫几个手下趁人不注意的时候把他拖出去的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've shown me something, so maybe you can help me with a matter that's a little more important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你展现了你的实力，也许你能帮我做些更重要的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, then. Once you part ways, return here. I'll look forward to hearing your report. Oh, and take this to cover the hiring cost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧，等他做完了你这单生意，你就回来找我复命。我期待着你的报告。噢，这些钱你拿去，雇他的费用我替你垫了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to back him up. See this through, and there'll be something good waiting for you when you get back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你能给他搭把手。只要这事顺利解决，等你回来，我不会亏待你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Oh, I wasn't expecting you to agree so easily. That's great!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？哦，没想到你这么容易就答应了。真是太好了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emily Ortal [0011904E] (file) Quest : ([0011A0C5]vfreeformlucky38) The Moon Comes Over the Tower EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, take this packet sniffer. It'll allow us to intercept data on Mr. House's network.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿着，带上这个数据探测器。它能让我们截取豪斯先生网络上的数据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emily Ortal [0011904E] (file) Quest : ([0011A0C5]vfreeformlucky38) The Moon Comes Over the Tower EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might have to manually remove the encryption from his data network, but hopefully you won't have too much trouble. Good luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也许得手动破解数据网络密钥，不过应该不会遇到太多麻烦。祝你好运！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emily Ortal [0011904E] (file) Quest : ([0011A0C5]vfreeformlucky38) The Moon Comes Over the Tower EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I spoke to Clanden, and I couldn't get anything out of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和克兰顿谈过了，但没套出什么话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, this is Clanden. This guy is one sick motherfucker. The way I see it, you have a few options.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，是克兰顿，这个烂杂种。我觉得你有好几种办法来对付他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you could use what's on these tapes to get him by himself, or maybe you could use them to leverage him out of the casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以利用磁带上的这些东西引他单独出来，或者用它们来逼他离开赌场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found these tapes in Clanden's room. Can you verify this is him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在克兰顿的房间里找到了这些磁带，你看看这是他吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll deal with that should the time come, Pace. Now I'm sure these gentlemen are as anxious to get out of here as we are to see them go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等时机成熟，我们会把这事摆平的，佩瑟。现在我估计这帮先生们已经坐立不安，巴不得早点离开这儿了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're dealing with the King, not you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们只和猫王打交道，没你的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to have to deal with me whether you like it or not. Get them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才不管你们愿不愿意，总之你们得先过我这一关！干掉他们！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I... No. We would never survive. We need to stick together.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 我…不，那样我们必死无疑，我们必须团结一致。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll go with whatever the King decides, but I'll be watching these NCR scumbags like a hawk. If they try anything...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我服从猫王的决定，但我也会盯着这帮NCR的渣滓。如果他们敢耍什么花招的话……

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you'll fight him *and* the NCR? Can the Kings afford to fight each other?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想同时跟他*还有*NCR对着干？猫王帮能承受双线开战的后果吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] No, I won't even consider this. We'll show the NCR they can't bully us!
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 不，想都别想。要让NCR知道，骑在我们头上作威作福是不可能的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just shut up and do what your leader tells you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 赶快闭嘴，按你们老大说的办！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was afraid this would happen. Sergeant, you know what to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就担心会变成这样。中士，这儿就交给你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the f-? Get the others! Now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？妈的！快叫其他人来！快！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pacer, I won't let you ruin this opportunity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 佩瑟，我不会让你坏了我的好事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's see you stop me, then. Guys, let's teach these soldier boys a lesson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我倒要看看你们怎么阻止我。伙计们，给这帮阿兵哥一点颜色看看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep it to yourself, but Hanlon is the one behind the misinformation. He's got a plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说了你可不要告诉别人，汉隆是信息误报的幕后主使。他有他的打算。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Chief? But, he's a legend! I guess if he's got a plan behind it all, who am I to question it? I won't say a word about it to anyone else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军士长？但，他是传奇人物啊！就算他真的有什么计划，我又有什么资格质疑？这件事我不会跟别人说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tech Sergeant Reyes [0010D23D] (file) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. Private Stone was stealing them.
I appreciate you doing this for me. Here's a little something for your trouble, it's not much, but it's all I can spare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你帮我做这件事让我非常感激。这里是一点小意思，数量不多，但是我只能省出这么多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, I think I understand what the issue here is. Excuse me for a moment, would you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，我知道问题出在哪儿了。请您稍等一下，可以吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gloria Van Graff [0010C67D] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay everyone, show's over. Back to work!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了各位，演出结束了。回去干活！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gloria Van Graff [0010C67D] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha ha, I think he wet himself before he left. That was pretty good making up that part about sleeping with Jacob.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈，我觉得他走之前肯定尿裤子了。和雅各布睡觉？你真能编。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You {stressed}did make that part up, right, Glory?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那确实是你编的吧，格罗利亚？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn it, girl, what has mama always said about tipping the help? I thought this was about him stealing money from us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，姑娘，妈妈平时你怎么教你要报答小恩小惠的？我还以为是要和他算偷钱的账呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He {stressed}was stealing money, though he could have kept it for all I cared. God knows he earned it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是偷了钱，不过我无所谓，让他拿着好了。反正也是他赚来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gloria Van Graff [0010C67D] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to talk about the attack on Nelson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈关于攻击纳尔逊的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to give you something to thank you for helping us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想给你些东西作为回报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He wanted to scare the NCR into retreating from this region - all to save lives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他想吓跑进入这个区域的NCR部队——他只是为了避免继续有人伤亡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Chief should've known that the NCR is too stubborn to back down from anything, even when it's for the best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军士长应该清楚，即便是明白利害关系，NCR对到手的东西也是不会轻易放弃的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tech Sergeant Reyes [0010D23D] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: While I'm glad it wasn't an enemy who was spreading lies and killing morale, I'm disappointed that a legend like the Chief felt he had to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我很高兴散布谣言、打击士气的并不是敌人，可我对军士长的做法还是很失望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tech Sergeant Reyes [0010D23D] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever the Chief had in mind, I'm sure it was the right thing to do - even if it did end up scaring a lot of people in the process.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论军士长的动机是什么，我都相信他的判断——即便这样的举动会吓着许多人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's complicated. Hanlon caused the misinformation, but I convinced him to stop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 挺复杂的。总之就是汉隆制造了虚假消息，不过我劝服他收手了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait... what? Why would he do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等……什么？他为什么要那样做？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tech Sergeant Reyes [0010D23D] (file) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is that fool doing? I need you to head out there and try to defuse the situation. Tell them I'm willing to cooperate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个傻瓜在干什么？我要你马上过去平息事态。告诉他们我愿意合作。
跟我讲讲你的兄弟姐妹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're a wild bunch. There's my sister Frieda, who used to run this branch but took off to pursue "the opportunity of a lifetime", as she put it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一群人都很野。我姐姐弗莉达以前经营这个分店，不过后来她撂挑子跑了，说是要去追寻 "一生的机遇"。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The rest are all long stories, and I don't got the time to tell them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他人的故事也很多，但我现在没有时间讲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. I'll have the medical supplies for you by the time you come back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了。等你回来时，我会把药品准备好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emily Ortal [0011904E] (file) Quest : ([0011A0C5]vfreeformlucky38) The Moon Comes Over the Tower EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, take this packet sniffer. It will allow us to intercept data on Mr. House's network.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿着，带上这个数据探测器。它能让我们截取豪斯先生网络上的数据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emily Ortal [0011904E] (file) Quest : ([0011A0C5]vfreeformlucky38) The Moon Comes Over the Tower EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might have to manually remove the encryption from his data network, but hopefully you won't have too much trouble. Good luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也许得手动破解数据网络密钥，不过应该不会遇到太多麻烦。祝你好运！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emily Ortal [0011904E] (file) Quest : ([0011A0C5]vfreeformlucky38) The Moon Comes Over the Tower EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好迎接更大的挑战了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've proven yourself, stranger. Your blood hungers for glory and I'll placate its thirst.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经证明了自己，陌生人。你的鲜血在渴求荣耀，就让我来平息你的欲望吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Lucy [001347D9] (file) Quest : ([001348DB]VMS38) Bleed Me Dry EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 指明你要挑战的对手吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Lucy [001347D9] (file) Quest : ([001348DB]VMS38) Bleed Me Dry EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to fight in the arena.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想进竞技场挑战一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Player has companion}Only you may enter. Tell your companion to wait and speak to me again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只能一个人进去。让你的同伴等着，然后再来找我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am {WUHL-pace In-CUL-tah}Vulpes Inculta, of {KAI-zar's}Caesar's Legion. I serve my master as the greatest of his {froo-men-TAR-ee}Frumentarii.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是{GAB-en}沃尔普斯·因库塔，隶属{KAI-zar's}凯撒军团。我以军团特工的身份为我的主人效命。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We Frumentarii are soldiers of a different stripe, capable in battle, but skilled as infiltrators and agents as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们特工和其他军士不同，虽然我们一样骁勇善战，但最擅长的还是渗透和谍报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I admire the purity of the Legion's justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团的正义如此纯粹，令我钦慕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're unusually bright for a Profligate. Well done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你居然如此开窍，作为一名荒淫之人真有些不同寻常。很好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now go, and teach what you've learned here. There will be more lessons in the days ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以走了，把这里看到的一切告诉其他人吧。在未来的日子里，你们还会学到更多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It has a stark beauty, doesn't it? I'm glad you can appreciate it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这显然是一种质朴的美，不是吗？我很高兴你能欣赏它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now go, and teach them what you learned here. There will be more lessons in the days ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以走了，把在这里看到的一切告诉其他人吧。在未来的日子里，你们还会学到更多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like they got what was coming to them.
Yes, they did. As will all the rest of you, in due time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，确实如此。你们迟早也一样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now go, and teach what you've learned here. There will be more lessons in the days ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以走了，把在这里看到的一切告诉其他人吧。在未来的日子里，你们还会学到更多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, they did. As will all the rest of them, in due time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，确实如此。他们其他人迟早也一样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now go, and teach them what you've learned here. There will be more lessons in the days ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以走了，把在这里看到的一切告诉其他人吧。在未来的日子里，你们还会学到更多。
跟我说说凯撒军团的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion is civilization reborn. Our culture is based on virtues such as martial excellence, loyalty, and justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团象征着文明的重生。我们的文化植根于尚武、忠诚和正义之类美德之上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you'll learn all there is to know in due time. {Le-GAH-tus La-nee-OOS}Legatus Lanius, Monster of the East, will soon arrive to command {KAI-zar's}Caesar's troops in battle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过这些还是留着你以后慢慢学习吧。{Le-GAH-tus La-nee-OOS}特使拉尼厄斯，东方之兽，很快就要来指挥{KAI-zar's}凯撒的部队作战了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Dam will fall, and the rest of the Profligate west will soon follow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大坝必将落入我们手中，西部其他的荒淫之人也会随之灭亡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where to begin? That you are weak, and we are strong? This much was known already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从哪开始说呢？他们很弱，我们很强？这个已经是众所周知的了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the depths of your moral sickness, your {a beat}dissolution? Nipton serves as the perfect object lesson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但说起他们的劣根性，{a beat}吃里扒外？尼普顿就是个很好的例子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where to begin? That they are weak, and we are strong? This much was known already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从哪开始说呢？他们很弱，我们很强？这个已经是众所周知的了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the depths of their moral sickness, their {a beat}dissolution? Nipton serves as the perfect object lesson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但说起他们的劣根性，{a beat}吃里扒外？尼普顿就是个很好的例子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Agreed. If we take the power plant, this battle is over. I'll have my men focus their efforts there. May the Son of Mars go with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 同意。只要控制发电厂，战斗就会结束。我会让我的人马集中进攻那里。愿战神之子庇护着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Centurion [0013CA37] (file) Quest : ([00137AB9]VHDLegionBattle) Veni, Vidi, Vici EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The power plant is what really matters. Have all of your men attack there. I'll finish things here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 发电厂才是关键所在。让你的全部人马进攻那里。这边的活我来搞定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doctor Henry, do as he asks.

ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，很好。你很明智，人类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0013F70D] (ID) Quest : ([0013F405]VMS41) Guess Who I Saw Today EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] No more negotiating, and definitely no more waiting. This is your last chance before we take it by force.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 不必白费口舌了，我也没耐心再等。这是你最后的机会，否则我们只能采取武力了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0013F70D] (ID) Quest : ([0013F405]VMS41) Guess Who I Saw Today EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doctor Henry doesn't have the cure just yet, but he's almost there. Be patient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亨利医生还没研究出治疗方法，但已经快了。耐心点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everybody has to do it. Well, everybody who wants to be a Khan, anyways. They toss you into the ring there and beat on you for a solid minute.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个人都要过这一关。呃，我指的是想要加入大汗帮的人。他们会把你扔进场子里，然后让你整整挨上一分钟的打。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jerry the Punk [001413BD] (file) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还能喘气儿，就算通过了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jerry the Punk [001413BD] (file) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give Med-X> Painkillers like these, you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: <拿出吗啡针-X> 你意思是这种止痛药？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa... you were serious. Okay, yeah, this might just work. Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇……你动真格的呀。好吧，对，没准还真能派上用场。谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jerry the Punk [001413BD] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just wait here a minute, I'll be back with some Med-X.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我一会儿，我去带些吗啡针-X回来。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jerry the Punk [001413BD] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cheat? The only way I could cheat is if I was so doped up on painkillers that I don't feel anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 耍花招？我唯一能耍的花招就是吃止痛药吃到中毒，让自己彻底失去知觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jerry the Punk [001413BD] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, maybe not if you're some hulking reprobate like Regis or baked to the gills like Jack. I've tried five times and still haven't made it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那当然，如果你像雷吉斯那样四肢发达，或者杰克那样结实耐打，肯定很容易。我试了五次，都没成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jerry the Punk [001413BD] (file) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar will kill me unless he believes I blew something up down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你能让凯撒相信我完成了任务，否则他一定会杀了我的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see - you're in a predicament.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了——你的处境也很艰难。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just off the turbine room down below are three power regulators. It's a redundant system - only one is needed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在涡轮机房下面有三个电力调节器。那是备用系统——只要一个能运转就够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go ahead and destroy one. The explosion will be large enough to be heard and felt aboveground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去随便炸掉一个吧。爆炸的威力应该能让地面上的人察觉到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [00125BB5] (ID) Quest : ([00116B58]VDialogueMrHouse) Mr. House's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've spent too many years waiting for this moment to see it fumbled by an insubordinate contractor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经为这一刻等候了多年，绝不允许一个不守信用的人将它毁于一旦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't reach through this monitor and compel you to follow instructions, but know this - if you disappoint me, you will pay for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我不能从屏幕里爬出来，逼着你听话，但你记住——如果你敢让我失望，我会让你付出代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [00125BB5] (ID) Quest : ([00116B58]VDialogueMrHouse) Mr. House's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Attack] I think it's time to knock you down a peg or two, Ranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击] 我看是该修理修理你了，游骑兵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Right. You have trouble even saying the word "bad". Go on, get out of here if you know what's good for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 得了吧。你连"坏"这个字都说不利索。走吧，如果你还识好歹，就离开这儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to do some good, head up to Camp Forlorn Hope. I'll mark it on your map for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想做好事的话，可以去飘零希望营地。我会在地图上给你标出它的位置。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't do anything dishonorable, if that's what you mean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是这么打算的，那我告诉你，我不会干这种不光彩的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {laughing a bit}"Dishonorable", that's a good one. Okay then, you can just turn around and head back toward Novac or wherever it is you came from.
ESP.TRADUIT: {laughing a bit}"不光彩"，说得好。好啦，你可以调头回诺瓦克了，或者说，哪来的回哪去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't want you to get any dirt under your fingernails or tarnish your good name or whatever the heck you're so worried about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本来也不想脏了你的手，坏了你的名声，或者糟践了别的什么你在乎的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to do some good, head up to Camp Forlorn Hope. I'll mark it on your map for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想做好事的话，可以去飘零希望营地。我会在地图上给你标出它的位置。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's Novac, due west. Just look for the big lizard. They got some decent supplies and a place to stay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正西方是诺瓦克。只要看见大蜥蜴就是了。他们那儿的物资和住宿条件都不错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The 188's north on the 95, good for all kinds of trade. Not much south on 95 unless you turn west on 164 to Nipton, right off the rail line.
ESP.TRADUIT: 188贸易站在95号公路的北边，那地方适合做贸易。沿着95号公路往南走一小段，再向西上164号公路，就能抵达尼普顿，它就在铁路旁边。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on. Let me help out. Trust me.
[FAILED] That's one of the least trustworthy lines I've ever heard. Sorry. No can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 这是我听过最可不信的话之一。抱歉，不行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to do some good, head up to Camp Forlorn Hope. I'll mark it on your map for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想做好事的话，可以去飘零希望营地。我会在地图上给你标出它的位置。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Proceed to your accomodations. Please, enjoy your stay at Vault 21.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请前往您的房间，希望您在21号避难所住得愉快。
电子保安在这里干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vault 21's previous manager is no longer capable of servicing your needs. Hotel arrangement functions are now purview of Mr. House.
ESP.TRADUIT: 21号避难所的前任经理已无法再为您效劳了。旅馆的经营业务现在由豪斯先生全权接管。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Had him figured for NCR, one of the rangers maybe. Anyway, speaking of the NCR, I need you to take a walk down to Primm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。他可能是NCR，也可能是游骑兵。说到NCR，我希望你去一趟普瑞姆。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR hasn't raised hell over our breakout, and I want to find out why. They're up to something, I can feel it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们越狱后，NCR还没有发起反攻，我想知道为什么。凭我个人的直觉，他们一定在搞什么名堂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chavez has been dealt with. You won't see him around here anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 查韦兹已经完蛋了，你再也不会看见他了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm happy you cleared that up for me, but we've got another situation to worry about. There's a merchant hanging around near the prison.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴你帮我除掉了那个杂种，但又出了个状况，监狱附近有个商人在晃悠。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something feels funny about him, and I want you to deal with him. Shake him down if he's legit, but if not, take him out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感觉这人有点可笑，你去和他打个交道。如果他是干合法生意的，就勒索他一把，如果他另有目的，就做了他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is Powder Ganger territory - my territory. Most of the guys around here understand that. One, Chavez, doesn't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是炸药帮的地盘，我的地盘。这周围绝大多数人都明白这点。只有一个人，查韦兹，他不明白。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chavez formed his own crew and have been hitting traders on their own. Everybody I've sent after him either got killed or weren't able to catch him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 查韦兹自己组织了团伙去袭击商队。而我派去追捕他的人要么被杀了，要么都失败而归。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That leaves you. What do you say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以这件差事就托付给你了，你说呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing's changed. Chavez won't answer to me, but he and his crew operate in {emphasis "my"}my territory. Deal with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么改变，查韦兹依然不听我的话，他和他的团伙还在{emphasis "我的"}我的地盘里胡作非为。把他解决掉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I'll stand on my own, just like I always have. Just like a King should.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我就为自己而战吧，何况我一直如此。身为猫王帮的人就该如此。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If this statement is being broadcast, I am deceased. Please approach a Securitron and take one of the printed obituaries.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有人听到这个广播，那证明本人已不在人世。请向就近的电子保安领取我的讣告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucky 38 Tannoy [060035DA] (mod) NPC : [00125BB5] (ID) Quest : ([00116B58]VDialogueMrHouse) Mr. House's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I, Robert Edwin House, am deceased. Please approach a Securitron and take one of the printed obituaries.
ESP.TRADUIT: 本人，罗伯特·艾德温·豪斯，已经不在人世。请向就近的电子保安领取我的讣告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucky 38 Tannoy [060035DA] (mod) NPC : [00125BB5] (ID) Quest : ([00116B58]VDialogueMrHouse) Mr. House's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've convinced me. Your secret is safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说服了我，我不会泄露你的秘密的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if you're working for Caesar or if desperation's made me a heck of a lot more persuasive. Either way, this is the right thing to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道究竟是因为你在为凯撒卖命，还是因为走投无路的人说话更有分量。总之，你这么做是对的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I trust we're done discussing this. I'm going to step through that door and pretend like we never had this talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我想咱们应该是商量完了。我打算从那道门出去，咱们就当这场谈话从未发生过吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are the details of the plan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 整个计划详细流程是怎样的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {excited}Again, goal number one is to eliminate Mr. House and install my neuro-computational matrix on the Lucky 38's mainframe!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我再说一次，第一步，必须消灭豪斯先生，然后将我的神经元运算系统植入幸运38的中央主机里！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Given how you're a new arrival, I also recommend that you get to know some of the region's tribes, so you can decide how you feel about them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到你初来乍到，我建议你先结交一些本地的势力，好对他们有个初步的印象！

ESP.ORIGINAL: By the time you've finished up all of that, the Legion should be close to attacking Hoover Dam and we'll execute the last phase of the plan!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一切快大功告成时，军团也差不多该攻打胡佛水坝了，到那时，我们就执行这项计划的最后一步！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Subject E: Diagnosis complete. Begin Recording.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实验型号E: 诊断完成。开始记录。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My name is Whitley. I'm a researcher at Adams Air Force base. Until recently I was in charge of the Duraframe reinforcement project for the combat model Eyebots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫韦斯利，是亚当斯空军基地的一名研究员。最近一段时间，我都在负责战斗型眼球机器人“杜拉骨架”的强化项目。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [00125BB5] (ID) Quest : ([00116B58]VDialogueMrHouse) Mr. House's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 过来吧，介绍一下你自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [00125BB5] (ID) Quest : ([00116B58]VDialogueMrHouse) Mr. House's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come now, don't keep me waiting.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [00125BB5] (ID) Quest : ([00116B58]VDialogueMrHouse) Mr. House's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I invited you here so we could talk, not so you can nose around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我邀请你来，是为了和你说话，不是叫你东张西望的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [00125BB5] (ID) Quest : ([00116B58]VDialogueMrHouse) Mr. House's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready to go to the dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经准备好去水坝了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! So I've been looking over Mr. House's force projections and running some calculations...
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了！我刚刚查阅了豪斯先生就双方兵力所作的评估，还进行了一番运算……

ESP.ORIGINAL: It turns out there are two ways we can win this thing! Hear that? We have options!
ESP.TRADUIT: 结果是，我们有两种方法可以取胜！听见没？我们有得选！

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...only to be done in by a mail carrier with a grandiosity complex.
ESP.TRADUIT: ……可这一切都毁在了一个送信小卒的手里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [00125BB5] (ID) Quest : ([00116B58]VDialogueMrHouse) Mr. House's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think you're doing well to have made it this far?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为能走到这一步是你的本事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [00125BB5] (ID) Quest : ([00116B58]VDialogueMrHouse) Mr. House's Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : [Casino floor] EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your chances of breaking through my defenses, they're... minimal, at best!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你攻破我防御系统的几率，哪怕在最理想的情况下，也几乎……为零！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [00125BB5] (ID) Quest : ([00116B58]VDialogueMrHouse) Mr. House's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [00125BB5] (ID) Quest : ([00116B58]VDialogueMrHouse) Mr. House's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would've made you wealthy! You could've helped change the world!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本可以让你富甲一方！你本可以助我改变世界！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [00125BB5] (ID) Quest : ([00116B58]VDialogueMrHouse) Mr. House's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn it, will you die already?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [00125BB5] (ID) Quest : ([00116B58]VDialogueMrHouse) Mr. House's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You dared come here, after what you did?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你干出那种事，竟然还有脸来？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [00125BB5] (ID) Quest : ([00116B58]VDialogueMrHouse) Mr. House's Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : [Casino floor] EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think you're going to do? Fight your way up to the penthouse and assassinate me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想搞什么名堂？一路杀到顶楼来干掉我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [00125BB5] (ID) Quest : ([00116B58]VDialogueMrHouse) Mr. House's Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : [Casino floor] EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You came here to finish what you think you started?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是来为自己闯下的祸都做个了结吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [00125BB5] (ID) Quest : ([00116B58]VDialogueMrHouse) Mr. House's Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : [Casino floor] EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is nothing compared to what's waiting for you up in the penthouse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等到了顶层，你就会发现自己所做的一切是多么愚蠢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [00125BB5] (ID) Quest : ([00116B58]VDialogueMrHouse) Mr. House's Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : [Casino floor] EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vegas will still rise again. Your betrayal won't defeat me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 维加斯必将东山再起，你的背叛是不会令我倒下的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [00125BB5] (ID) Quest : ([00116B58]VDialogueMrHouse) Mr. House's Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : [Casino floor] EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Lucky 38 will be your grave. I'll finish what Benny couldn't get right!
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸运38将是你的葬身之处。本尼没做成的事，就由我来完成！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [00125BB5] (ID) Quest : ([00116B58]VDialogueMrHouse) Mr. House's Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : [Casino floor] EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Rhonda} Utobitha, I'm here with Best Friend Tabitha, who has a message for all the dumb-dumbs out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: {朗达}乌托比萨，好朋友塔比瑟正和我在一起，她有重要信息要告知所有收听广播的蠢蛋变种人们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Rhonda, faint, she's not speaking into the mike} What do you think we should play next?
ESP.TRADUIT: {朗达}那你觉得我们接下来该放点什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Rhonda} You're listening to another edition of Know - Your - Mutants, with Best Friend Tabitha!
ESP.TRADUIT: {朗达}欢迎再次收听变种人面面观！欢迎好朋友塔比瑟！

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Rhonda} Welcome, Utobitha, to another episode of Know - Your - Mutants!
ESP.TRADUIT: {朗达}欢迎再次收听新一期的变种人面面观！

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Rhonda} Welcome to another episode of Know - Your - Mutants!
ESP.TRADUIT: {朗达}欢迎再次收听这一期的变种人面面观！

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Tabitha} Do you remember the good old days where the Master ruled over us all?
ESP.TRADUIT: {塔比瑟}还记得主教麾下的那些美好时光吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Rhonda} We're here once again with our beloved leader. Best Friend Tabitha, why don't you tell our listeners what you just told me?
ESP.TRADUIT: {朗达}我们再次邀请到了万人敬仰的领袖。她就是我们最好的朋友塔比瑟，为什么不和听众们谈谈刚才你和我提到的事儿？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Rhonda} We're back with Best Friend Tabitha, who was telling us why humans should {cue angry Tabitha voice}STAY THE HELL AWAY, {back to normal Rhonda voice}ier, keep their distance from the State of Utobitha.
ESP.TRADUIT: {朗达}我们的好朋友塔比瑟又回来了，她曾告诉我们，人类应该滚得远远的，或者说，他们必须远离乌托比萨的领土。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh man, Gloria's going to be pissed when she hears about this. Still, he started it, so we probably won't go to war with the Kings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，老兄，格罗利亚知道了肯定会发火的。不过话说回来，又不是我们先动的手，猫王帮大概不会和我们撕破脸吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Van Graff Thug [00118374] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narrating Her Own Ending}The slaughter of the Van Graffs and the Crimson Caravan caused no end of trouble for NCR back West.
ESP.TRADUIT: 范格拉夫家族和深红商队的灭门惨案给西部的NCR带来了无穷无尽的麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narrating Her Own Ending}Already struggling, NCR's supply lines suffered further as the two caravans withdrew support until the "massacre in the East" was resolved.
ESP.TRADUIT: 两大商队宣称，除非“东部大屠杀”得到解决，否则他们就无限期撤销对NCR的支援，这令原本就举步维艰的NCR补给线雪上加霜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narrating Her Own Ending}The caravan families went so far as to send agents East to hunt down Cass and the Courier. None returned.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narrating Her Own Ending}商队家族甚至派人东进追杀卡丝和邮差，结果全都有去无回。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narrating her Own Ending}Both companies finally decided not to chase their losses. The week after their decision, the headquarters of both companies were destroyed.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narrating her Own Ending}两家公司最终决定及时止损。而就在这个决定作出的一周后，它们的总部双双灰飞烟灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narratin, Her Own Ending}The graffiti, "see you in hell" written in gunpowder, was attributed to Powder Gangers, not the Cassidy Caravan massacre so long ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narratin, Her Own Ending}那行用火药写成的“地狱再见”涂鸦，被认定是炸药帮的手笔，而非多年前凯西迪商队屠杀案的遗存。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narrating Her Own Ending}In the years following the destruction of Cassidy Caravans, NCR used evidence of the plot to blackmail the Crimson Caravan and the Van Graffs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 盖西迪商队覆灭后的数年间，NCR一直在利用手头的证据胁迫深红商队公司和范格拉夫家族。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narrating Her Own Ending}NCR enacted strict trade laws with little resistance, strengthening their supply lines and their position in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR毫无阻力地颁布了严格的贸易法令，不仅强化了后勤保障，也巩固了自身在莫哈维的地位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narrating Her Own Ending}Both the Van Graffs and Alice McLafferty were removed from their post in the East.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narrating Her Own Ending}范.格拉夫兄妹和爱丽丝.麦克拉夫迪都被解除了在东部的职务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narrating Her Own Ending}During their trek West, however, their caravan was wiped out by raiders using advanced weaponry and military tactics. No cargo was taken.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narrating Her Own Ending}然而在西行途中，他们的商队遭遇武装匪帮伏击全军覆没，对方动用先进武器和军事战术，货物却分毫未取。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narrating Her Own Ending}When questioned, the Gun Runners denied any involvement, claiming they would have no... {emph, a little sinister}public motivation for such an attack.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narrating Her Own Ending}面对质询时，军火贩子矢口否认参与此事，声称他们“根本不存在发动这种袭击的...{emph, a little sinister}公开动机”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I see the wisdom in that. I'll radio for a unit to head up to Primm and offer some additional support.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 言之有理，我会派一支部队去普瑞姆，并且给那边提供一点额外的补给。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Having Primm - and the trade route - under NCR control would help the West.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将普瑞姆及附近的商路都控制在NCR手上，对西边会比较有利。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I help Ringo, and Goodsprings will like me more. What if I help the Powder Gangers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我帮林戈，清泉镇就会更喜欢我。那如果我帮炸药帮呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {slight anger - player just asked about helping criminals}Don't know why you'd want to go do a thing like that. Yeah, you'd get on their good side, but people around here wouldn't appreciate it one bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不明白你为什么会这样想。没错，他们可能会给你点好处，但这里的人会和你翻脸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happens if I help Ringo?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我帮了林戈会怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you were able to get Ringo out of this mess, you'd have a decent reputation around Goodsprings. I'd even set you up with a discount.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能帮林戈收拾这个烂摊子，清泉镇对你的看法将大为改观。我甚至会给你折扣价。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, helping Ringo would also make the Powder Gangers mad, and they've got a {emphasize "lot"}lot of friends out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了，你帮林戈的话，炸药帮肯定会发疯，他们在外面的朋友可不少呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll look for your men and supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去寻找你的人和补给。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks. Watch your back out there. Never know when those Legion bastards might show up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢。在那要保持警惕。你永远都不知道那些军团杂种会什么时候出现。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll do what I can - and those folks that got killed need to be answered for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会尽力而为——必须要给那些被杀害的人一个说法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. Tell the troops to come protect Primm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。命令部队来保护普瑞姆吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Roger, I'll radio them over now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 了解，我会用无线电联系他们的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please don't hurt us no more. I'm begging you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 求你不要再伤害我们了。求求你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll... we'll pay you. Whatever we got, you can have it. We'll put together a collection every couple of days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会……我们会上缴东西给你。你看中什么都给你。每隔几天我们就把东西集中一次交上来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll leave it under a rock beneath the old windmill. Think of it as a... as a sign of respect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就放在老风车旁的一块岩石下面。就当是……当是表达我们的敬意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got trouble. The NCR are planning a raid on this place soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们有麻烦了。NCR已经要对这里发起进攻了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {explosion heard}Sounds like they're already here. There's no way I'm letting them take me alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: {explosion heard}听这声音，他们应该是已经打过来了，我绝不会让他们活捉我的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no reason for you to stick around and help us, but feel free to kill a few of the bastards on your way out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没必要留在这儿帮我们，但你如果能在出去时顺便替我干掉几个杂种，我也不反对。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I get to kill you over and over again. <Attack Yes Man.>
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我就一次又一次地杀死你！<攻击好好先生。>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hahaha! I knew there was a positive in it somewhere!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈哈！我就知道你有这种干劲！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just tell me what to do.
I wish I could, but I'm neuro-computationally incapable of making decisions like this one! It's up to you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也想告诉你该怎么做，可我的神经演算根本无法作出决定！只能靠你自己了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've already made arrangements with the Followers. I'm ready to fight at the dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经和天启追随者达成了协议，水坝的战斗我也准备好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! So I've been looking over Mr. House's force projections and running some calculations...
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了！我刚刚查阅了豪斯先生就双方兵力所作的评估，还进行了一番运算……

ESP.ORIGINAL: It turns out there are two ways we can win this thing! Hear that? We have options!
ESP.TRADUIT: 结果是，我们有两种方法可以取胜！听见没？我们有得选！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what they're up to and I don't want to know. I just hope no harm comes to Novac.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道它们在做什么，也不想知道。我只希望不会损害到诺瓦克的安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not much to live off of around here, except salvage from that factory. If they made off with anything expensive, we'd be hurting something fierce.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了去那家工厂里捡废品，这附近没什么能赖以为生的活计。如果它们拿走了什么值钱的东西，那我们损失可就大了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I will say this. If all of 'em turned up dead tomorrow, I couldn't see as to how they'd be missed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我可以这么说。要是它们明天早上全死了，也没人会惦记它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That might even be a desirable thing, knowing the town was safe from the likes of them. There'd be a reward in it if some brave soul made it happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果镇子能不受它们侵害的话，那真的很让人高兴。如果有哪位勇士能让这愿望成真的话，我们是不会亏待他的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't like it, leave.
Don't mind if I do. Enjoy your reign as King Scumbag the First, Overlord of Westside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真走了你可别后悔。好好享受加冕人渣之王的快感吧，西区霸主。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't mind if I do. Enjoy your reign as Queen Scumbag the First, Overlord of Westside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真走了你可别后悔。好好享受加冕人渣女王的快感吧，西区霸主。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've helped out around here, sending troops to Primm will fortify the NCR in the region.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把这附近的问题都解决了，往普瑞姆派兵可以增强NCR在这一地区的防御力量。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see the wisdom in that. I'll radio for a unit to head up to Primm and offer some additional support.
ESP.TRADUIT: 言之有理，我会派一支部队去普瑞姆，并且给那边提供一点额外的补给。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me more about your tribe.
We have dwelt in the Narrows since the End That Came In Fire, when the Father in the Caves punished the world and made us forget the holy tongue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自末日之火降临以来，我们就一直住在狭路地带，当时洞中的先父惩罚了世界，让我们忘记了圣语。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [02009665] (ID) EmotionType : Sad NPC : [02009665] (ID) EmotionType : Sad NPC : Waking Cloud [02009665] (mod) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have had good relations with the other tribes in the valley. At least, before Salt-Upon-Wounds brought his White Legs here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在山谷里，我们和其他几个部落都保持着良好的关系。但在伤口撒盐带着白腿部落来后，一切都改变了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [02009665] (ID) EmotionType : Puzzled NPC : [02009665] (ID) EmotionType : Puzzled NPC : Waking Cloud [02009665] (mod) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have Daniel to thank for our continued existence. His advice and help has kept the White Legs from overrunning us so far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于丹尼尔，我们才能活到今天。在他的建议和帮助下，白腿部落至今还没有把我们打倒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [02009665] (ID) EmotionType : Surprise NPC : [02009665] (ID) EmotionType : Surprise NPC : Waking Cloud [02009665] (mod) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do not know how long even he can protect us, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我不知道他还能保护我们多久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [02009665] (ID) EmotionType : Fear NPC : [02009665] (ID) EmotionType : Fear NPC : Waking Cloud [02009665] (mod) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: When we learned that Salt-Upon-Wounds had defiled Zion with his presence, Daniel ordered the children, the old, and the sick evacuated from the camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我们得知伤口撒盐的人已经用他们的存在玷污了锡安之后，丹尼尔命令所有的小孩、老人和病人优先撤离营地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [02009665] (ID) EmotionType : Sad NPC : [02009665] (ID) EmotionType : Sad NPC : Waking Cloud [02009665] (mod) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: My husband volunteered to lead the hunters that went with them for protection.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的丈夫志愿带领着一队猎手，一路保护他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [02009665] (ID) EmotionType : Puzzled NPC : [02009665] (ID) EmotionType : Puzzled NPC : Waking Cloud [02009665] (mod) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I try not to worry about them, but we have had no news for so long, and Daniel seems sad when I ask him about it. Sad... and a little frightened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试着不去担心他们，但我们和他们失去联系已经有很长时间了。当我问起丹尼尔时，他似乎很伤心，悲伤...而且有一丝惊恐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [02009665] (ID) EmotionType : Fear NPC : [02009665] (ID) EmotionType : Fear NPC : Waking Cloud [02009665] (mod) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll see you on the other side.
This is taking too long. We can't let Salt-Upon-Wounds escape. I'm going to find a way around. God willing, we will finish this together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们浪费的时间太多了，绝不能让伤口撒盐逃跑。我去寻找另一条路。上帝保佑我们尽快结束这一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is taking too long. We can't let Salt-Upon-Wounds escape. I'm going to find a way around. God willing, we will finish this together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们浪费的时间太多了，绝不能让伤口撒盐逃跑。我去寻找另一条路。上帝保佑我们尽快结束这一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you know of the White Legs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对白腿部落了解多少？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're hateful savages who live only to plunder and destroy. Their leader is a devil called Salt-Upon-Wounds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是可恨的野蛮人，活着就是为了掠夺和破坏。他们的领袖是一个叫做伤口撒盐的恶魔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: War is all he knows. Everything he has, everything that tribe has, was taken by force, raiding and scavenging.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他只知道战争。他所有的一切，他的部落所拥有的一切，都是通过武力，掠夺和拾荒得来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's said there's no man deadlier at close range, that that powerfist of his has smashed a hundred skulls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说没有人敢靠近他，他佩戴的动力拳套已经至少击碎了一百颗头骨。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe that's true, but so what? It's a low form of leadership. A tribe that knows only war has no future. And so he'll lead them to Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许这个谣传是真的，但又能怎样？这是一种低级的领导方式，一个只知道战争的部落不会被命运女神垂青。所以他只能带领他们去找凯撒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd just like a drink, thanks.
You can have as much as you like! Just, eh... please don't put your lips on the faucet? It's so unsanitary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想喝多少就喝多少！只是，呃…请别把你的嘴唇放到管口上好吗？那太不卫生了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cross the dam and make your way to the western power plant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 穿过大坝并设法进入西侧发电厂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find the enemy commander, General Oliver.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到敌人的指挥官奥利弗将军。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to the Legate and tell him that General Oliver has been killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找特使，告诉他奥利弗将军已经被杀死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to the Legate and tell him that General Oliver has been driven off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找特使，告诉他奥利弗将军已经逃跑了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill General Oliver and the soldiers guarding him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死奥利弗将军和保护他的士兵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Take out the snipers who've taken up position in the western portion of the dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)解决掉大坝西侧的狙击手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Release the waiting Legion reinforcements inside the intake tower.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)与进水塔中待命的军团援军取得联系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to Lily about participating in Doctor Henry's experiment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和莉莉谈谈协助亨利博士进行实验的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Ask Lily to help you investigate the Nightstalker mutations.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)邀请莉莉帮助你调查夜行兽变异的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell Doctor Henry to proceed with the experiment once Lily is present.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等莉莉到位的时候，通知亨利博士开始实验。
杀死与你为敌的夜行族。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look for the source of the Nightstalker stealth mutation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 寻找夜行兽隐形变异的来源。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell Doctor Henry you've discovered a potential cause for the Nightstalker mutations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉亨利博士，你已经发现了夜行兽变异的可能来源。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Keene and try to defuse the situation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和基恩交谈并找出解决方法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait for Doctor Henry to complete the experiment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等待亨利博士完成实验。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Decide whether or not Lily should continue to wear the Mark II prototype and inform Doctor Henry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 思考莉莉是否应当继续穿着二号原型机，把你的决定告诉亨利博士。
没有救世主，也不靠神仙皇帝

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go to the Control Room in Hoover Dam and install the override chip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往胡佛大坝的控制室安装强制覆写芯片。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go to the Control Room in Hoover Dam and install the override chip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往胡佛大坝的控制室安装强制覆写芯片。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Activate the eastern power plant to power the Securitron Army.
ESP.TRADUIT: 启动东部发电厂，激活电子保安部队。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exit out to the east side of the Dam.
Head to the Legate's camp and deal with the Legate and Caesar's Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往特使的大营，与特使和凯撒军团谈判。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with General Oliver and the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与奥利弗将军和NCR部队谈判。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Yes Man with news of your victory.
Go to the Power Plant Control Room.
Unleash the Securitrons! Armies! Will! Clash!
ESP.TRADUIT: 解锁机器保安！好、戏、上、演！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Mr House and inform him of your victory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着胜利的消息向豪斯先生报告。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go to the Control Room in Hoover Dam and install the override chip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往胡佛大坝的控制室安装强制覆写芯片。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Activate the eastern power plant to power the Securitron Army.
ESP.TRADUIT: 启动东部发电厂，激活电子保安部队。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exit out to the east side of the Dam.
Head to the Legate's camp and deal with the Legate and Caesar's Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往特使的大营，与特使和凯撒军团谈判。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with General Oliver and the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与奥利弗将军和NCR部队谈判。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Mr House with news of your victory.
Head to the summit of Black Mountain and end Tabitha's reign of terror.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往黑山顶峰，终结塔比瑟的残暴统治。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Meet Neil in the village near the summit of Black Mountain.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)和尼尔在黑山顶峰旁的村落中见面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the source of the Black Mountain Radio broadcast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查黑山电台广播的来源。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get to the vault's inner chamber.
Thread Vera's music sequence together at the Receptionist Terminal in the Lobby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在大厅的接待终端中组合薇拉的演唱片段。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Escape the Sierra Madre Vault before your collar explodes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在项圈爆炸前逃离马德雷山脉赌场避难所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Discover the secrets of the Sierra Madre at the Vault's central chamber.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往避难所的中央金库，解开马德雷山脉赌场的秘密。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gain access to the Sierra Madre Vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进入马德雷山脉赌场避难所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Sneak out of the Vault's chamber area undetected, trapping Elijah when he opens the vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选) 在不被发觉的情况下悄悄溜出金库，并在以利亚打开金库时将他困住。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Recover the map of Zion Canyon.
Leave Zion and return to the Mojave Wasteland.
Return to the Mojave via the Southern Passage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过南部通道返回莫哈维。
可选：传递尤利西斯的临终遗言

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Water merchant" dealt with. Return to Eddie.
ESP.TRADUIT: "贩水商人"已经处理了。回去找埃迪。
贩水商人被杀了。回去报告埃迪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scout Primm and find out what the NCR's up to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查普瑞姆，弄清楚NCR的企图。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Track down the suspicious merchant and get rid of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到那个可疑的商人并除掉他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to the locals in Primm and learn what - if anything - the NCR is planning for the correctional facility.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与普瑞姆的当地人交谈，了解NCR是否有计划夺回劳教所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell Eddie that you dealt with Chavez.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉埃迪你已经处理了查韦斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Report back to Eddie with information on the NCR's planned attack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去报告埃迪，说NCR已经做好进攻的准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Betray Eddie by offering Lieutenant Hayes assistance in retaking the prison.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)背叛埃迪并在海耶斯中尉重夺监狱的过程中给予帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to Sunny Smiles about fighting the Powder Gangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和微笑桑尼谈谈对抗炸药帮的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Convince Chet to open his store's stock to the town.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)说服切特让他打开镇上已经关闭的商店。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Ringo when you're ready for the gunfight with the Powder Gangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找林戈准备和炸药帮的人大干一场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Ringo and let him know that Sunny Smiles has agreed to help you fight the Powder Gangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到林戈处让他知道微笑桑尼已经答应了与你一起对抗炸药帮。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Offer to help Ringo deal with the Powder Gangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主动提出帮助林戈对付炸药帮。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Acquire additional medical supplies from Doc Mitchell.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)从米切尔医生处获得额外的药品补给。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Moon Comes Over the Tower
Disable the Lucky 38's network encryption from three executive consoles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 骇入三个远程端口，使幸运38的网络加密系统无效化。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bug an access point to the Lucky 38's data network for the Followers of the Apocalypse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮助天启追随者骇入幸运38的数据网络接入端口。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Emily Ortal on the New Vegas strip with news that the tower has been bugged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到新维加斯长街找艾米莉·欧托，告诉她你已经骇进了高塔的网络。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Lucky 38 Reactor is being powered by the El Dorado substation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸运38的反应堆是由埃尔·多拉多变电站供电的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bug an access point to the Lucky 38's data network for the Followers of the Apocalypse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮助天启追随者骇入幸运38的数据网络接入端口。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Emily Ortal on the New Vegas Strip with news that the tower has been bugged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到新维加斯长街找艾米莉·欧托，告诉她你已经骇进了高塔的网络。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Disable the Lucky 38's network encryption from three executive consoles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 骇入三个远程端口，使幸运38的网络加密系统无效化。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Mike Lawson suggested flushing the Legionnaires through the turbines to stop their invasion of the station.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选) 麦克·劳森建议你用涡轮机清剿来犯的军团，阻止他们入侵发电厂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion is attacking Hoover Dam, the Legate's camp must be destroyed to protect the dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团正在进攻胡佛大坝，必须摧毁特使的营地才能保护大坝。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Activate the pressure release valve to flush the Legionnaires through the turbines.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选) 打开泄压阀，利用涡轮机把军团士兵冲走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The dam overflow has been diverted into the turbines, the Legion can no longer use them to access the power plant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大坝的水流已经被引到了涡轮机里，军团再也无法利用它们来入侵发电厂了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The battle has been won. Return to General Oliver.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战斗胜利了。回去向奥利弗将军报告。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Red Lucy needs Giant Mantis' eggs. It's faster to gather them at a breeding ground, like Vault 22.
ESP.TRADUIT: 血手露西需要巨型螳螂的卵。可以去它们的产卵地附近收集，比如说22号避难所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Red Lucy with the Giant Mantis Eggs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着巨型螳螂卵回去找血手露西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Red Lucy wants Radscorpion eggs. She suggested searching for them in the mountains north of Goodsprings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 血手露西想要辐射蝎的卵。她建议你在清泉镇北部的山脉寻找。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Red Lucy with the Radscorpion Eggs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着辐射蝎卵回去找血手露西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Red Lucy wants Fire Gecko eggs. She suggested searching near the Ireteba Peaks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 血手露西要火蜥蜴的卵。她建议你在艾瑞特巴峰林附近搜索。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Red Lucy with the Fire Gecko Eggs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着火蜥蜴卵回去找血手露西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The elite hunters for The Thorn are looking for Night Stalker eggs. Red Lucy suggested to look at a cave near Bitter Springs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 荆棘街的精英猎人们正在寻找夜枭蛋。血手露西建议你到苦泉附近的一个洞穴内寻找。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Red Lucy with the Night Stalker Eggs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着夜枭蛋回到血手露西处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The elite hunters of The Thorn are now in search of Cazador eggs. Red Lucy suggested to look for them near Red Rocks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 荆棘街的精英猎人们正在寻找着猎蜂卵。血手露西建议你在红岩峡谷附近寻找。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Red Lucy with the Cazador Eggs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着猎蜂卵回到血手露西处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Red Lucy has given the most dangerous task a hunter could face. She wants Deathclaw Eggs for The Thorn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 血手露西向你提出了一项最严峻的挑战。为荆棘街带一个死亡爪蛋回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Red Lucy with the Deathclaw Eggs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着死亡爪蛋回到血手露西处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are the greatest hunter that The Thorn has ever seen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在是荆棘街有史以来最好的猎人了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Red Lucy is dead. You can no longer help her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 血手露西死了。你无法帮助她了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need a repair skill of %.0f to disarm this trap.
ESP.TRADUIT:
修理技能不够摆弄这陷阱。
(需要修理技能%.0f或更高)

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Nuka-Cola Vending Machine is currently out of stock.

^Modified Nuka-Cola Machine^This ancient Nuka-Cola machine has been modified to accept bottlecaps as payment. It seems to be automatically restocked every few days.|Leave it alone.|Nuka-Cola: %g caps.|Nuka-Cola Quantum: %g caps.|Nuka-Cola Quartz: %g caps.|Nuka-Cola Victory: %g caps.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without the members of Happy Trail Caravans' maps and mountaineering expertise, you cannot safely make it to Zion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 缺少了欢乐小径商队的成员！没有他们的地图和登山指导，你无法安全到达锡安！
